abilities.description: (PASSIVE)TRIAL BY FIREEvery few seconds, Gangplank's melee strike will set his opponent on fire.
abilities.name: TRIAL BY FIREE

abilities.description: (Q)PARRRLEYShoots target, plundering Gold for each enemy unit killed.
abilities.name: PARRRLEYS

abilities.description: (W)REMOVE SCURVYEats citrus to cure crowd control effects and restore Health.
abilities.name: REMOVE SCURVYE

abilities.description: (E)POWDER KEGGangplank uncovers a powder keg at target location. If he attacks it, it explodes, spreading the attack's damage to enemies in the area, slowing them.
abilities.name: POWDER KEGG

abilities.description: (R)CANNON BARRAGEGangplank signals his ship to bombard an area, slowing and damaging enemies.
abilities.name: CANNON BARRAGEG
